Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/keywords/1797340691232452608/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Keyword Strategy"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/keywords/1797340691232452608/)_"
---
Your task is to generate a list of 20 keywords based on [PROMPT]. Then generate 3 blog topics per keyword. The first blog should match an informational search intent. The second blog should be a comparison or "how to" blog. The third blog should focus on how much the list keyword costs. Once all this is complete, put everything into a table. All outputs should be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
